duties_responsibilities.duty: Expand the consumer insights team’s capabilities and bandwidth.
Be a project leader for various consumer insights & research projects (including, but not limited to, focus groups, surveys, in-depth interviews, and market reports.)
Ability to turn research findings into detailed reports and actionable items related to the product roadmap and strategy.
Manage project action items and day-to-day communication with various third-party partners.
Provide expertise and innovative ideas to research methodologies & techniques – continually investigating new ways of conducting research.
Work with R&D and Industrial Design teams to get necessary prototypes/renderings for various research events.
Be a hands-on consumer insights associate – meaning somebody that is fully integrated into the product team & eventually understands how the product works, etc.

Maintain effective communication lines with global product planning teams, including taking occasional weekend/evening calls or meetings, helping track project milestones, deliverables, action items, etc.
Help investigate potential new markets that our product teams should be competing in – including scoping market opportunities, competitive analyses, etc.
Assist with various marketing-related items – such as marketing claim validation/research, claim compliance/testing, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in engineering or business/marketing
